data.name: RegisterUser
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] (UserTypeId, FirstName, LastName, EmailId, Password, CreatedDate) values (@userTypeId, @fistName, @lastName, @emailId, @password, @createdDate)

data.name: UserExist
data.value: Select UserId from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] where DeletedDate is Null and EmailId = @emailId

data.name: Login
data.value: Select UserId, UserTypeId from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] where DeletedDate is Null and EmailId = @emailId and Password = @password

data.name: ChangePassword
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] set Password = @password, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where UserId = @userId

data.name: FindUser
data.value: Select FirstName from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] where DeletedDate is Null and UserId = @userId
